column4: CAN SOMEONE TEST THIS: Does it search for driver everytime you go from no effects to normal/advanced...
sorry. the pm rule is kind of dumb.
it does for me too, it's just seeing if the driver is installed activated
now when you click cancel, do it again, does it search for driver
yeah, seems to
so it doesn't search for driver anymore?
I meant if I cancel, it searches when I try again?
yes
click cancel on search and try again
It's stopped trying to search for the driver, it now works automatically, maybe it's every time that X is restarted or something?
I logged out and logged back in. Do you think it is *really* using driver since you canceled search?
log out and log in restarts X, still doesn't search
well I know that my video driver is installed and in use anyway, so it should work either way for me
ok so now you have same bug I do
we need to find a way to make it search again
I seem not to have an X log
that's peculiar
nevermind, i had quotes arund command
using the same driver as me
can you use compiz now?
yeah, it's working
hmmmmm
it is searching for driver again lol
